mapper.insert: insert into WorkArrangement (w_id, w_title, d_id, m_name, w_date, w_remarks, w_contents) values (#{wId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mName}, #{wDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{wRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wContents,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update WorkArrangement set w_title = #{wTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_id = #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, m_name = #{mName}, w_date = #{wDate,jdbcType=DATE}, w_remarks = #{wRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_contents = #{wContents,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where w_id = #{wId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select d.d_id,w_id,w_title,w_contents,w_date,w_remarks,d_name,m_name from WorkArrangement w join DepartmentType d on d.d_id=w.d_id
select d.d_id,w_id,w_title,w_contents,w_date,w_remarks,d.d_name,m_name from WorkArrangement w join DepartmentType d on d.d_id=w.d_id where w_title like concat('%',#{wTitle},'%')
select d.d_id,w_id,w_title,w_contents,w_date,w_remarks,d.d_name,m_name from WorkArrangement w join DepartmentType d on d.d_id=w.d_id where d.d_id=#{dId}
